column1: Hey there, Diana!\! Little Alex has just been wanderin' around lookin' for somethin' to keep him busy - I figured he'd...
column2: ¡Hola, Diana!\! El pequeño Alex ha estado buscando algo con lo que mantenerse ocupado. Supuse que...

column1: You've taken quite a beatin'.\! 'N it's all been for the lot of us.\! Gettin' Alex back... but it still ain't enough I guess...
column2: Te has dado un buen tute,\! y todo ha sido por nosotros.\! Por recuperar a Alex..., pero supongo que no es suficiente.

column1: I thought it would be better...
We can only take so much.\! You're needin' rest my dear...\| Please sit this one out.\! You've done far more than your fair share...
column2: No podemos ocuparnos de todo.\! Necesitas descansar, cielo...\| Mantente al margen esta vez.\! Ya has hecho más de lo que tendrías que haber hecho.

column1: I have been lent the blessing of Galzus. His might will not be wasted.
column2: He tomado prestada la bendición de Galzus. No echaré a perder su poder.

column1: Stefan...\| Alex has been through a lot and needs to be shown love.\! I cannot show it right now...
column2: Stefan...\| Alex ha sufrido demasiado últimamente y necesita que le den algo de cariño.\! Yo no puedo dárselo ahora mismo.

column1: ...\| I hear ya. Don't worry 'bout it...
column2: ...\| Te entiendo. No te preocupes por ello.
